      • cluster

        com.datastax.driver.core.Cluster cluster()
        Get the Cluster object associated with the only Cassandra service bound to the app.
        Returns:
        the Cassandra Cluster
        Throws:
        CloudException - if there are either 0 or more than 1 Cassandra database services.

      • cluster

        com.datastax.driver.core.Cluster cluster(CassandraClusterConfig config)
        Get the Cluster object associated with the only Cassandra service bound to the app configured as specified.
        Parameters:
        config - configuration for the Cluster created
        Returns:
        the Cassandra Cluster
        Throws:
        CloudException - if there are either 0 or more than 1 Cassandra database services.

      • cluster

        com.datastax.driver.core.Cluster cluster(String serviceId)
        Get the Cluster object associated with the Cassandra serviceId bound to the app.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the Cassandra serviceId
        Returns:
        the Cassandra Cluster
        Throws:
        CloudException - if there is no service bound with the serviceId

      • cluster

        com.datastax.driver.core.Cluster cluster(String serviceId,
                                         CassandraClusterConfig config)
        Get the Cluster object associated with the Cassandra serviceId bound to the app configured as specified.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the Cassandra serviceId
        config - configuration for the Cluster created
        Returns:
        the Cassandra Cluster
        Throws:
        CloudException - if there is no service bound with the serviceId
